attributes.action: Abolish the unjust scenario where drugs are available by prescription in Scotland but denied to citizens in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We hear that so many drugs are available to patients in Scotland and Wales on prescription but denied to citizens in England.
This is blatantly unjust as we are all citizens of UK PLC and we all pay tax at the same rate. We require a fair and just system that treats everyone equally.
